'''Radiant Spincrystal 74''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Melody of Hidden Seeds]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a giant clover plant in [[Vanarana]] above a broken tree.

==Location==
Follow these Four-Leaf Sigils to get on top of the giant plants and get Radiant Spincrystal 74.
